vtdGenSimIcd.h

00001 /*********************************************************
00002 * ICD of the Generic Simulation Interface (GSI)          *
00003 *------------------------------------------------------- *
00004 * (c) VIRES GmbH                 Author: Marius Dupuis   *
00005 * -----------------------------------------------------  *
00006 * change log:                                            *
00007 *  10.01.2008: created                                   *
00008 *  22.01.2008: upgrade to "simulation" interface         *
00009 *  25.01.2008: beta for Revision 0x0002 (not released)   *
00010 *              header contains array size                *
00011 *  03.03.2008: Revision 0x0001                           *
00012 *              added message and structure for video     *
00013 *              image transfer                            *
00014 *  05.03.2008: Revision 0x0003                           *
00015 *              added messages for line information of    *
00016 *              master                                    *
00017 *  11.03.2008: introduced image port                     *
00018 *  11.04.2008: Revision 0x0004 introduced package        *
00019 *              END_OF_FRAME                              *
00020 *  14.04.2008: introduced posUSK in structure            *
00021 *              GSI_TRAF_OBJECT_STATE_t                   *
00022 *              introduced elevInertial in structure      *
00023 *              GSI_ROAD_POS_INFO_t                       *
00024 *  06.05.2008: Revision 0x0005                           *
00025 *              introduced GSI_CAMERA_INFO and            *
00026 *              corresponding package GSI_PKG_ID_CAMERA   *
00027 *              added player types MOTORBIKE and BUS      *
00028 *  13.05.2008: Revision 0x0006                           *
00029 *              extracted GSI_ROADMARK_INFO_t from        *
00030 *              GSI_ROAD_POS_INFO_t; extended info with   *
00031 *              USK data of line positions                *
00032 *  21.05.2008: Rev. 0x0006  GSI_PKG_ID_CAMERA 0x0002:    *
00033 *              added posUSK to structure                 *
00034 *              GSI_CAMERA_INFO_t                         *
00035 *  26.06.2008: GSI_PKG_ID_CAMERA rev 0x0002:             *
00036 *              added posUSK to structure                 *
00037 *              GSI_CAMERA_INFO_t                         *
00038 *  11.07.2008: Revision 0x0007                           *
00039 *              added vertical curvature                  *
00040 *              to GSI_ROADMARK_t                         *
00041 *  25.08.2008: Revision 0x0008                           *
00042 *              acceleration and USK positions are now    *
00043 *              of new type GSI_POINT                     *
00044 *  26.08.2008: Revision 0x0009                           *
00045 *              "near" and "far" in camera package are    *
00046 *              now "clipNear" and "clipFar"              *
00047 *              extended GSI_TRAF_OBJECT_STATE_t with     *
00048 *              "speedUSK" and "accelUSK"                 *
00049 *              added GSI_LIGHT_SOURCE_INFO_t             *
00050 *  01.09.2008: Revision 0x000A                           *
00051 *              corrected USK orientation of camera       *
00052 *  22.10.2008: Revision 0x000B                           *
00053 *              contact points introduced                 *
00054 *              GSI_PKG_ID_CONTACT_POINT                  *
00055 *              modified GSI_LIGHT_SOURCE_INFO_t (now     *
00056 *              providing template ID)                    *
00057 *              introduced symbolic constant              *
00058 *              GSI_SIZE_OBJECT_NAME and name             *
00059 *              field in GSI_TRAF_OBJECT_STATE_t          *
00060 *              introduced "posBoxUSK" in structure       *
00061 *              GSI_TRAF_OBJECT_STATE_t, representing the *
00062 *              USK co-ordinates of an object's bounding  *
00063 *              box according to CARMEQ document,         *
00064 *              chapter 6                                 *
00065 *  12.01.2009: Revision 0x000C                           *
00066 *              sensor feedback data contains cone info   *
00067 *              see GSI_SENSOR_DEF_t                      *
00068 *              added "noElements" to header info         *
00069 *              GSI_VEHICLE_SYS_t contains steering angle *
00070 *              introduced the following messages:        *
00071 *                + GSI_PKG_ID_DYNAMICS_INPUT             *
00072 *                + GSI_PKG_ID_DYNAMICS_OUTPUT            *
00073 *  15.04.2009: Revision 0x000D                           *
00074 *              added GSI_TRAFFIC_SIGN_t                  *
00075 *  27.04.2009: modified GSI_DYNAMICS_INPUT_t with        *
00076 *              steering values instead of steering wheel *
00077 *              values                                    *
00078 *              extended GSI_VEHICLE_DYN_t with setup     *
00079 *              information                               *
00080 *              vehicles and pedestrians no longer have a *
00081 *              maximum number, they are now treated like *
00082 *              contact points etc.                       *
00083 *  28.04.2009: USK position of traffic objects is of     *
00084 *              type GSI_COORD again                      *
00085 *              introduced GSI_PKG_ID_ENVIRONMENT         *
00086 *              introduced GSI_DRIVER_FLAG_xxx for driver *
00087 *              info in dynamics input                    *
00088 *  04.06.2009: introduced package with advanced info     *
00089 *              about traffic objects                     *
00090 *              GSI_PKG_TRAF_OBJ_CFG                      *
00091 *  04.08.2009: introduced package with additional info   *
00092 *              about pedestrian geometry                 *
00093 *              GSI_PKG_ID_PED_ANIMATION                  *
00094 *              extended GSI_PKG_TRAF_OBJ_CFG             *
00095 *  06.09.2009: added GSI_PKG_ID_SCORING                  *
00096 *  09.09.2009: introduced GSI_PKG_ID_TRIGGER             *
00097 *  28.09.2009: introduced prototype items of GSI Rev. 2  *
00098 *              these are signified by the prefix         *
00099 *              GSI2_ instead of GSI_                     *
00100 *  22.10.2009: added package GSI_PKG_ID_DRIVER_CTRL      *
00101 *              which can be used for the control of      *
00102 *              dynamics etc. from externally computed    *
00103 *              drivers                                   *
00104 *  04.02.2010: added message GSI_PKG_ID_TRLIGHT_INFO     *
00105 *  07.02.2010: added msg. GSI_PKG_ID_VEHICLE_DYN_SIMPLE  *
00106 *  22.04.2010: modified for 64bit compatibility          *
00107 *  26.07.2010: version 0x000D++                          *
00108 *              introduced GSI_PKG_ID_ROAD_STATE          *
00109 *              split "flags" in GSI_PKG_ID_ENVIRONMENT   *
00110 *              into flags and precipitation info         *
00111 *  02.08.2010: introduced roadS in scoring package       *
00112 *  25.08.2010: split object type in object list package  *
00113 *              into flags and ID                         *
00114 *  27.08.2010: introduced GSI_PKG_ID_LIGHT_SOURCE_CMPLX  *
00115 *  20.09.2010: modified pkg GSI_VEHICLE_WHEEL_SIMPLE_t:  *
00116 *              vAngular is now rotAngle                  *
00117 *  23.09.2010: added further vehicle light masks         *
00118 *  08.05.2014: added traffic driver control package      *
00119 *********************************************************/
00120 #pragma pack (push, 4)
00121 
00122 #ifndef _VTD_GENERIC_SIMULATION_ICD_H
00123 #define _VTD_GENERIC_SIMULATION_ICD_H
00124 
00125 /* ====== INCLUSIONS ====== */
00126 #include <sys/types.h>
00127 #include <stdint.h>
00128 
00129 /* ====== DEFINITIONS ====== */
00130 
00131 /* ------ general definitions ------ */
00132 #define GSI_DEFAULT_PORT   48180       /* default port for GSI communication        */
00133 #define GSI_FEEDBACK_PORT  48181       /* port for GSI feedback to taskControl      */
00134 #define GSI_IMAGE_PORT     48182       /* port for GSI image data                   */
00135 #define GSI_NAME_LENGTH       64       /* length of a name sent via GSI             */
00136 #define GSI_MAGIC_NO       14711       /* magic number                              */
00137 #define GSI_VERSION       0x000E       /* upper byte = major, lower byte = minor    */
00138                                       
00139 /* ------ array sizes ------ */       
00140 #define GSI_SIZE_LANE_INFO        8       /* maximum number of lanes with corresponding information */
00141 #define GSI_SIZE_ROADMARK_INFO    8       /* maximum number of roadmark information entries         */
00142 #define GSI_SIZE_WHEELS           4       /* maximum number of wheels at EGO                        */
00143 #define GSI_NO_SENSORS            5       /* maximum number of active sensors                       */
00144 #define GSI_NO_SENSOR_OBJECTS    50       /* maximum number of objects detected by sensors          */
00145 #define GSI_SIZE_ROADMARK_POINTS 64       /* USK points per roadmark                                */
00146 #define GSI_SIZE_OBJECT_NAME     32       /* maximum length of an object's name                     */
00147 #define GSI_SIZE_JOINT_VALUES    80       /* maximum number of values for pedestrian joint infos    */
00148 #define GSI_SIZE_FILENAME       256       /* number of bytes in a filename                          */
00149 #define GSI_SIZE_TRLIGHT_PHASES   8       /* maximum number of phases for a traffic light           */
00150 
00151 /* ------ message types ------ */
00152 #define GSI_PKG_ID_EGO                 0     /* EGO, macroscopic information (as for all other players)       */
00153 #define GSI_PKG_ID_EGO_DYN             1     /* EGO, dynamics information                                     */
00154 #define GSI_PKG_ID_VEHICLE             2     /* macroscopic vehicle player information                        */
00155 #define GSI_PKG_ID_PEDESTRIAN          3     /* info about pedestrian objects                                 */
00156 #define GSI_PKG_ID_OBJ_LIGHT           4     /* info about light objects                                      */
00157 #define GSI_PKG_ID_OBJ_TRSIGN          5     /* info about traffic signs objects                              */
00158 #define GSI_PKG_ID_OBJ_ENV             6     /* info about arbitrary environment objects                      */
00159 #define GSI_PKG_ID_IMAGE               7     /* video image                                                   */
00160 #define GSI_PKG_ID_OBJLIST             8     /* object list for detected objects                              */
00161 #define GSI_PKG_ID_END_OF_FRAME        9     /* sent as last package of a simulation frame                    */
00162 #define GSI_PKG_ID_CAMERA             10     /* camera parameters corresponding to video image                */
00163 #define GSI_PKG_ID_ROADMARK           11     /* road mark information of a player (typically EGO)             */
00164 #define GSI_PKG_ID_LIGHT_SOURCE       12     /* light source information                                      */
00165 #define GSI_PKG_ID_CONTACT_POINT      13     /* road data at a given contact point                            */ /* ver. 0x000B  */
00166 #define GSI_PKG_ID_DYNAMICS_INPUT     14     /* input of an external driver into a vehicle dynamics module    */ /* ver. 0x000C  */
00167 #define GSI_PKG_ID_DYNAMICS_OUTPUT    15     /* output a vehicle dynamics module                              */ /* ver. 0x000C  */
00168 #define GSI_PKG_ID_ENVIRONMENT        16     /* environment information                                       */ /* ver. 0x000D  */
00169 #define GSI_PKG_ID_TRAF_OBJ_CFG       17     /* traffic object configuration info                             */ /* ver. 0x000D+ */
00170 #define GSI_PKG_ID_PED_ANIMATION      18     /* pedestrian animation (joint angles etc.)                      */ /* ver. 0x000D+ */
00171 #define GSI_PKG_ID_SCORING            19     /* parameters for driver scoring (efficiency, safety, race etc.) */ /* ver. 0x000D+ */
00172 #define GSI_PKG_ID_TRIGGER            20     /* trigger info for next simulation frame                        */ /* ver. 0x000D+ */
00173 #define GSI_PKG_ID_DRIVER_CTRL        21     /* trigger info from externally controlled mockup                */ /* ver. 0x000D+ */
00174 #define GSI_PKG_ID_TRLIGHT_INFO       22     /* information about a traffic lights and their states           */ /* ver. 0x000D+ */
00175 #define GSI_PKG_ID_VEHICLE_DYN_SIMPLE 23     /* simplified vehicle dynamics info                              */ /* ver. 0x000D+ */
00176 #define GSI_PKG_ID_ROAD_STATE         24     /* road state information for a given player                     */ /* ver. 0x000D++ */
00177 #define GSI_PKG_ID_LIGHT_SOURCE_CMPLX 25     /* complex light source information                              */
00178 #define GSI_PKG_ID_TRLIGHT_SIMPLE     26     /* simplified traffic light information                          */ /* ver. 0x000D+ */
00179 #define GSI_PKG_ID_TRAF_DRIVER_INFO   27     /* driver control information by traffic                         */ /* ver. 0x000E  */
00180 
00181 /* --- new message types for GSI release 2, don't use until officially released!!! --- */
00182 #define GSI2_PKG_ID_MASTER          200
00183 #define GSI2_PKG_ID_VEHICLE         202
00184

00187 #define GSI_OBJECT_TYPE_CAR         1
00188 #define GSI_OBJECT_TYPE_TRUCK       2
00189 #define GSI_OBJECT_TYPE_VAN         3
00190 #define GSI_OBJECT_TYPE_BIKE        4
00191 #define GSI_OBJECT_TYPE_PEDESTRIAN  5
00192 #define GSI_OBJECT_TYPE_PED_GROUP   6
00193 #define GSI_OBJECT_TYPE_POLE        7
00194 #define GSI_OBJECT_TYPE_TREE        8
00195 #define GSI_OBJECT_TYPE_BARRIER     9
00196 #define GSI_OBJECT_TYPE_OPT1       10
00197 #define GSI_OBJECT_TYPE_OPT2       11
00198 #define GSI_OBJECT_TYPE_OPT3       12
00199 #define GSI_OBJECT_TYPE_MOTORBIKE  13
00200 #define GSI_OBJECT_TYPE_BUS        14

00203 /* ------ object flags ------ */
00204 #define GSI_OBJECT_FLAG_NONE               0x0000
00205 #define GSI_OBJECT_FLAG_CRITICALITY_LOW    0x0001
00206 #define GSI_OBJECT_FLAG_CRITICALITY_MEDIUM 0x0002
00207 #define GSI_OBJECT_FLAG_CRITICALITY_HIGH   0x0003       /* yes, this really is 0x0003! */

00209 /* ------ light states ------ */
00210 #define GSI_VEHICLE_LIGHT_OFF           0x00000000       /* all lights OFF                       */
00211 #define GSI_VEHICLE_LIGHT_PARK          0x00000001       /* front and rear lights are ON         */
00212 #define GSI_VEHICLE_LIGHT_LOWBEAM       0x00000002       /* front and rear lights are ON         */
00213 #define GSI_VEHICLE_LIGHT_HIGHBEAM      0x00000004       /* front and rear lights are ON         */
00214 #define GSI_VEHICLE_LIGHT_REAR_BRAKE    0x00000008       /* only rear lights are ON              */
00215 #define GSI_VEHICLE_LIGHT_REAR_DRIVE    0x00000010       /* only rear lights are ON              */
00216 #define GSI_VEHICLE_LIGHT_INDICATOR_L   0x00000020       /* front and rear lights are ON         */
00217 #define GSI_VEHICLE_LIGHT_INDICATOR_R   0x00000040       /* front and rear lights are ON         */
00218 #define GSI_VEHICLE_LIGHT_FLASH         0x00000080       /* special light for police forces etc. */
00219 #define GSI_VEHICLE_LIGHT_FRONT_FOG     0x00000100       /* only front lights are ON             */
00220 #define GSI_VEHICLE_LIGHT_REAR_FOG      0x00000200       /* only rear lights are ON              */
00221 #define GSI_VEHICLE_LIGHT_VIRES1        0x00000400       /* used internally by VIRES             */ 
00222 #define GSI_VEHICLE_LIGHT_DRL           0x00000800       
00223 #define GSI_VEHICLE_LIGHT_DRL_LEFT_LOW  0x00001000       
00224 #define GSI_VEHICLE_LIGHT_DRL_RIGHT_LOW 0x00002000       
00226 /* ------ lane border types ------ */
00227 #define GSI_LANE_BORDER_UNKNOWN          0
00228 #define GSI_LANE_BORDER_NONE             1
00229 #define GSI_LANE_BORDER_POLE             2
00230 #define GSI_LANE_BORDER_BARRIER          3
00231 #define GSI_LANE_BORDER_SOFT_SHOULDER    4
00232 #define GSI_LANE_BORDER_HARD_SHOULDER    5
00233 #define GSI_LANE_BORDER_CURB             6

00235 /* ------ road mark types ------ */
00236 #define GSI_ROADMARK_TYPE_NONE           0
00237 #define GSI_ROADMARK_TYPE_SOLID          1
00238 #define GSI_ROADMARK_TYPE_BROKEN         2
00239 #define GSI_ROADMARK_TYPE_CURB           3
00240 #define GSI_ROADMARK_TYPE_GRASS          4
00241 #define GSI_ROADMARK_TYPE_BOTDOT         5
00242 #define GSI_ROADMARK_TYPE_OTHER          6

00244 /* ------ road mark colors ------ */
00245 #define GSI_ROADMARK_COLOR_NONE          0
00246 #define GSI_ROADMARK_COLOR_WHITE         1
00247 #define GSI_ROADMARK_COLOR_RED           2
00248 #define GSI_ROADMARK_COLOR_YELLOW        3
00249 #define GSI_ROADMARK_COLOR_OTHER         4

00251 /* ------ wheel indices ------ */
00252 #define GSI_WHEEL_FRONT_LEFT             0
00253 #define GSI_WHEEL_FRONT_RIGHT            1
00254 #define GSI_WHEEL_REAR_LEFT              2
00255 #define GSI_WHEEL_REAR_RIGHT             3
00256 
00257 /* ------ gear box types ------ */
00258 #define GSI_GEAR_BOX_TYPE_AUTOMATIC      0
00259 #define GSI_GEAR_BOX_TYPE_MANUAL         1
00260 
00261 /* ------ drivetrain types ------ */
00262 #define GSI_DRIVETRAIN_TYPE_FRONT        0
00263 #define GSI_DRIVETRAIN_TYPE_REAR         1
00264 #define GSI_DRIVETRAIN_TYPE_AWD          2
00265 
00266 /* ------ image pixel formats ------ */
00267 #define GSI_PIX_FORMAT_RGB            0  /*  8 bit RGB data               */
00268 #define GSI_PIX_FORMAT_RGB_16         1  /* 16 bit RGB data               */
00269 #define GSI_PIX_FORMAT_RGB_24         2  /* 24 bit RGB data               */
00270 #define GSI_PIX_FORMAT_RGBA           3  /*  8 bit RGB data + 8 bit alpha */
00271 #define GSI_PIX_FORMAT_RGBA_16        4  /* 16 bit RGB data + 8 bit alpha */
00272 #define GSI_PIX_FORMAT_RGBA_24        5  /* 24 bit RGB data + 8 bit alpha */
00273 #define GSI_PIX_FORMAT_BW_8           6  /*  8 bit GREY data              */
00274 #define GSI_PIX_FORMAT_BW_16          7  /* 16 bit GREY data              */
00275 #define GSI_PIX_FORMAT_BW_24          8  /* 24 bit GREY data              */
00276 #define GSI_PIX_FORMAT_DEPTH_8        9  /*  8 bit DEPTH data             */
00277 #define GSI_PIX_FORMAT_DEPTH_16      10  /* 16 bit DEPTH data             */
00278 #define GSI_PIX_FORMAT_DEPTH_24      11  /* 24 bit DEPTH data             */
00279 
00280 /* ------ sensor types ------ */
00281 #define GSI_SENSOR_TYPE_NONE             0  /* unknown sensor type  */
00282 #define GSI_SENSOR_TYPE_RADAR            1  /* radar sensor         */
00283 #define GSI_SENSOR_TYPE_VIDEO            2  /* radar sensor         */
00284 
00285 /* ------ lane existence masks ------ */
00286 #define GSI_LANE_EXISTS_OWN         0x0001  /* own lane exists    */        /* ver. 0x0003 */
00287 #define GSI_LANE_EXISTS_LEFT        0x0002  /* left lane exists   */        /* ver. 0x0003 */
00288 #define GSI_LANE_EXISTS_RIGHT       0x0004  /* right lane exists  */        /* ver. 0x0003 */
00289 
00290 /* ------ lane status masks ------ */
00291 #define GSI_LANE_STATUS_NONE        0x0000  /* nothing special    */        /* ver. 0x0003 */
00292 #define GSI_LANE_STATUS_ROADWORKS   0x0001  /* road works         */        /* ver. 0x0003 */
00293 #define GSI_LANE_STATUS_EXIT        0x0002  /* motorway exit      */        /* ver. 0x0003 */
00294 #define GSI_LANE_STATUS_ENTRY       0x0004  /* motorway entry     */        /* ver. 0x0003 */
00295 #define GSI_LANE_STATUS_LINKED      0x0008  /* linked lanes       */        /* ver. 0x0003 */
00296 
00297 /* ------ position types ------ */
00298 #define GSI_POS_TYPE_NONE                0  /* default */                                      /* ver. 0x0009 */
00299 #define GSI_POS_TYPE_RELATIVE            1  /* relative position in object's co-ordinates */   /* ver. 0x0009 */
00300 #define GSI_POS_TYPE_INERTIAL            2  /* absolute, i.e. inertial position           */   /* ver. 0x0009 */
00301 
00302 /* ------ dynamics input flags ------ */
00303 #define GSI_DRIVER_FLAG_NONE                  0x00000000  /* default                                    */   /* ver. 0x000D */
00304 #define GSI_DRIVER_FLAG_INDICATOR_L           0x00000001  /* driver activated left indicator            */   /* ver. 0x000D */
00305 #define GSI_DRIVER_FLAG_INDICATOR_R           0x00000002  /* driver activated right indicator           */   /* ver. 0x000D */
00306 
00307 /* ------ arbitrary state flags ------ */
00308 #define GSI_STATE_FLAG_NONE                   0x00000000  /* default                                    */   /* ver. 0x000D+ */
00309 #define GSI_STATE_FLAG_COLLISION              0x00000001  /* driver caused collision                    */   /* ver. 0x000D+ */
00310 #define GSI_STATE_FLAG_OFF_ROAD               0x00000002  /* driver went off road                       */   /* ver. 0x000D+ */
00311 
00312 /* ------ traffic light phases ------ */
00313 #define GSI_TRLIGHT_PHASE_OFF           0
00314 #define GSI_TRLIGHT_PHASE_STOP          1
00315 #define GSI_TRLIGHT_PHASE_STOP_ATTN     2
00316 #define GSI_TRLIGHT_PHASE_GO            3
00317 #define GSI_TRLIGHT_PHASE_GO_EXCL       4
00318 #define GSI_TRLIGHT_PHASE_ATTN          5
00319 #define GSI_TRLIGHT_PHASE_BLINK         6
00320 #define GSI_TRLIGHT_PHASE_UNKNOWN       7

00322 /* ------ road mark information ------ */
00323 /* ------ generic co-ordinate structure --- */
00324 typedef struct 
00325 {
00326     double x;        /* x position           [m] */
00327     double y;        /* y position           [m] */
00328     double z;        /* z position           [m] */
00329 } GSI_POINT_t;
00330 
00331 typedef struct
00332 {
00333     int32_t     id;                                  /* id of road mark                                                    [0..15] */  /* ver. 0x0003 */
00334     int32_t     prevId;                              /* id of predecessor                                                  [0..15] */  /* ver. 0x0003 */
00335     int32_t     nextId;                              /* id of successor                                                    [0..15] */  /* ver. 0x0003 */
00336     float       lateralDist;                         /* lateral distance to vehicle ref. point and dir                         [m] */  /* ver. 0x0003 */
00337     float       yawRel;                              /* yaw angle relative to vehicle dir                                    [rad] */  /* ver. 0x0003 */
00338     float       curvHor;                             /* horizontal curvature                                                 [1/m] */  /* ver. 0x0003 */
00339     float       curvHorDot;                          /* change of horizontal curvature                                      [1/m2] */  /* ver. 0x0003 */
00340     int32_t     type;                                /* type of road mark                                  [GSI_ROADMARK_TYPE_xxx] */
00341     int32_t     color;                               /* color of road mark                                [GSI_ROADMARK_COLOR_xxx] */
00342     float       startDx;                             /* start of road mark in driving dir                                      [m] */
00343     float       previewDx;                           /* distance of last valid measurement                                     [m] */
00344     float       width;                               /* width of road mark                                                     [m] */
00345     float       height;                              /* height of road mark                                                    [m] */
00346     int32_t     noPoints;                            /* number of points valid in the following array                          [-] */ /* ver. 0x0006 */
00347     GSI_POINT_t posIn[GSI_SIZE_ROADMARK_POINTS];     /* inertial positions of tesselated road mark                         [m/m/m] */ /* ver. 0x0006 */
00348     GSI_POINT_t posUSK[GSI_SIZE_ROADMARK_POINTS];    /* USK positions of tesselated road mark                              [m/m/m] */ /* ver. 0x0006 */
00349     float       curvVert;                            /* vertical curvature                                                   [1/m] */ /* ver. 0x0007 */
00350     float       curvVertDot;                         /* vertical of vertical curvature                                      [1/m2] */ /* ver. 0x0007 */
00351 } GSI_ROADMARK_t;
00352 
00353 /* ------ lane information ------ */
00354 typedef struct
00355 {
00356     int16_t id;           /* lane ID according to OpenDRIVE                          [-8..8] */
00357     int16_t borderType;   /* type of lane border                       [GSI_LANE_BORDER_xxx] */
00358     float   width;        /* lane width                                                  [m] */
00359 } GSI_LANE_INFO_t;
00360 
00361 /* ------ road position and properties ------ */
00362 typedef struct
00363 {
00364     int16_t          roadId;                            /* unique road ID                                                  [-] */
00365     int16_t          laneId;                            /* lane ID                                                         [-] */
00366     float            laneOffset;                        /* offset from lane center in road co-ordinates                    [m] */
00367     float            hdgRel;                            /* heading angle relative to lane tangent dir                    [rad] */
00368     float            pitchRel;                          /* pitch angle relative to road tangent plane                    [rad] */
00369     float            rollRel;                           /* roll angle relative to road tangent plane                     [rad] */
00370     double           curvVert;                          /* vertical curvature in lane center                             [1/m] */
00371     double           curvVertDot;                       /* change of vertical curvature in lane center                  [1/m2] */
00372     double           curvHor;                           /* horizontal curvature in lane center                           [1/m] */
00373     double           curvHorDot;                        /* change of horizontal curvature in lane center                [1/m2] */
00374     int32_t          noLaneInfo;                        /* number of valid lane information entries                        [-] */
00375     GSI_LANE_INFO_t  laneInfo[GSI_SIZE_LANE_INFO];      /* lane information entries                                        [-] */
00376     int32_t          laneExistenceMask;                 /* existence mask for lanes                      [GSI_LANE_EXISTS_xxx] */ /* ver. 0x0003 */
00377     int32_t          statusMask;                        /* status mask for position                      [GSI_LANE_STATUS_xxx] */ /* ver. 0x0003 */
00378 } GSI_ROAD_POS_INFO_t;
00379 
00380 /* ------ road mark information ------ */
00381 typedef struct
00382 {
00383     int32_t        playerId;                          /* unique of traffic object to which road mark info belongs        [-] */
00384     int32_t        noRoadMarks;                       /* number of valid roadmark information entries                    [-] */
00385     GSI_ROADMARK_t roadMark[GSI_SIZE_ROADMARK_INFO];  /* road mark information                                           [-] */
00386 } GSI_ROADMARK_INFO_t;
00387 
00388 /* ------ geometry information for an object --- */
00389 typedef struct 
00390 {
00391     float dimX;        /* x dimension in object co-ordinates (length)      [m] */
00392     float dimY;        /* y dimension in object co-ordinates (width)       [m] */
00393     float dimZ;        /* z dimension in object co-ordinates (height)      [m] */
00394     float offX;        /* x distance from ref. point to center of geometry [m] */
00395     float offY;        /* y distance from ref. point to center of geometry [m] */
00396     float offZ;        /* z distance from ref. point to center of geometry [m] */
00397 } GSI_GEOMETRY_INFO_t;
00398 
00399 /* ------ generic co-ordinate structure --- */
00400 typedef struct 
00401 {
00402     double x;        /* x position           [m] */
00403     double y;        /* y position           [m] */
00404     double z;        /* z position           [m] */
00405     double h;        /* heading angle      [rad] */
00406     double p;        /* pitch angle        [rad] */
00407     double r;        /* roll angle         [rad] */
00408 } GSI_COORD_t;
00409 
00410 /* ------ common traffic object (not vehicle) ------ */
00411 typedef struct
00412 {
00413     int32_t             id;                         /* unique ID                                                                              [-] */
00414     int32_t             type;                       /* object type                                                          [GSI_OBJECT_TYPE_xxx] */
00415     char                name[GSI_SIZE_OBJECT_NAME]; /* symbolic name                                                                          [-] */
00416     GSI_GEOMETRY_INFO_t geo;                        /* info about object's geometry                                                 [m,m,m,m,m,m] */
00417     GSI_COORD_t         posIn;                      /* inertial position and orientation of reference point                   [m,m,m,rad,rad,rad] */
00418     GSI_COORD_t         speedIn;                    /* inertial speed and rates                                   [m/s,m/s,m/s,rad/s,rad/s,rad/s] */
00419     GSI_POINT_t         accelIn;                    /* inertial acceleration                                                     [m/s2,m/s2,m/s2] */
00420     GSI_ROAD_POS_INFO_t roadInfo;                   /* additional road information at player's position                                       [-] */
00421     GSI_COORD_t         origUSKIn;                  /* Version 0x0004: inertial position/orientation of USK's origin          [m,m,m,rad,rad,rad] */
00422     GSI_COORD_t         posUSK;                     /* Version 0x000D: position in USK                                        [m,m,m,rad,rad,rad] */
00423     GSI_COORD_t         speedUSK;                   /* Version 0x0009: USK speed and rates                        [m/s,m/s,m/s,rad/s,rad/s,rad/s] */
00424     GSI_POINT_t         accelUSK;                   /* Version 0x0009: USK acceleration                                          [m/s2,m/s2,m/s2] */
00425     GSI_COORD_t         posBoxUSK;                  /* Version 0x000B: position of the object's bounding box in USK           [m,m,m,rad,rad,rad] */
00426 } GSI_TRAF_OBJECT_STATE_t;
00427 
00428 typedef struct
00429 {
00430     int32_t             id;                         /* unique ID                                                                              [-] */
00431     int32_t             type;                       /* object type                                                          [GSI_OBJECT_TYPE_xxx] */
00432     char                name[GSI_SIZE_OBJECT_NAME]; /* symbolic name                                                                          [-] */
00433     GSI_GEOMETRY_INFO_t geo;                        /* info about object's geometry                                                 [m,m,m,m,m,m] */
00434     GSI_COORD_t         posIn;                      /* inertial position and orientation of reference point                   [m,m,m,rad,rad,rad] */
00435     GSI_COORD_t         speedIn;                    /* inertial speed and rates                                   [m/s,m/s,m/s,rad/s,rad/s,rad/s] */
00436     GSI_POINT_t         accelIn;                    /* inertial acceleration                                                     [m/s2,m/s2,m/s2] */
00437 } GSI2_TRAF_OBJECT_STATE_t;
00438 
00439 /* ------ traffic object (not vehicle) ------ */
00440 typedef struct
00441 {

00447 } GSI_TRAF_OBJECT_CFG_t;
00448 
00449 /* ------ vehicle system information --- */

00460     float steeringSpeed;    /* steering speed                         [rad/s] */

00462     float brakePedal;       /* brake pedal position                [0.0..1.0] */

00464 } GSI_DRIVER_t;

00474     float torqueFriction;        /* friction torque                [Nm] */

00479 {

00482     float steeringAngle;          /* steering angle             [rad] */
00483 } GSI_VEHICLE_SUSPENSION_t;
00484 
00485 typedef struct
00486 {
00487     float                    vAngular;              /* angular velocity                [rad/s] */
00488     float                    forceZ;                /* wheel contact force                 [N] */
00489     float                    forceLat;              /* lateral force                       [N] */
00490     float                    forceLong;             /* longitudinal force                  [N] */
00491     float                    forceTireWheelXYZ[3];  /* force of tire on wheel              [N] */
00492     float                    radiusStatic;          /* static tire radius                  [m] */
00493     float                    radiusDynamic;         /* dynamic tire radius                 [m] */
00494     float                    slip;                  /* slip factor                  [0.0..1.0] */
00495     float                    brakePressure;         /* brake pressure at wheel            [Pa] */
00496     GSI_VEHICLE_SUSPENSION_t suspension;            /* wheel suspension information        [-] */
00497 } GSI_VEHICLE_WHEEL_t;
00498 
00499 typedef struct
00500 {
00501     float    torqueDriveShaft[GSI_SIZE_WHEELS];  /* torque at drive shaft                                     [Nm] */
00502     float    torqueGearBoxIn;                    /* torque at entry of gearbox                                [Nm] */
00503     float    torqueCenterDiffOut;                /* torque at exit of center differential                     [Nm] */
00504     float    torqueShaft;                        /* torque at shaft                                           [Nm] */
00505     uint32_t gearBoxType;                        /* type of gear box                       [GSI_GEAR_BOX_TYPE_xxx] */
00506     uint32_t driveTrainType;                     /* type of drivetrain                   [GSI_DRIVETRAIN_TYPE_xxx] */
00507     uint32_t gear;                               /* current gear position                                      [-] */
00508 } GSI_VEHICLE_DRIVETRAIN_t;
00509 
00510 /* ------ vehicle dynamics information ------ */

00588     char     name[32];    /* pkg-ver. 0x0002: name of the sensor                  [-] */  
00589     float    dxyz[3];     /* position relative to vehicle                         [m] */
00590     float    dhpr[3];     /* orientation relative to vehicle                    [rad] */
00591     float    fovHV[2];    /* field-of-view (horizontal/vertical)                [rad] */
00592     float    clipNF[2];   /* clipping ranges (near/far)                           [m] */
00593 } GSI_SENSOR_DEF_t;

00600     uint32_t           noObjects;                     /* number of active objects in list [-] */
00601     GSI_OBJECT_ENTRY_t entry[GSI_NO_SENSOR_OBJECTS];  /* detected objects                 [-] */
00602 } GSI_OBJECT_LIST_t;
00603

00605 typedef struct
00606 {

00610     float       clipFar;                    /* far clipping plane                                         [m] */

00632 {

00637     uint32_t     posType;                 /* position type of the light source                            [GSI_POS_TYPE_xxx] */
00638     GSI_COORD_t  position;                /* position and orientation of light source                    [m/m/m/rad/rad/rad] */
00639     float        nearFar[2];              /* near and far clip of light soure                                          [m,m] */
00640     float        frustumLRBT[4];          /* frustum left / right / bottom / top                                   [m,m,m,m] */
00641     float        intensity[3];            /* intensity of the light (ambient, diffuse, specular)                     [-,-,-] */
00642     float        atten[3];                /* attenuation (constant, linear, quadratic)                               [-,-,-] */
00643     int32_t      reserved0;
00644     int32_t      reserved1;
00645 } GSI_LIGHT_SOURCE_CMPLX_t;

00663 } GSI_DYNAMICS_INPUT_t;

00667 {

00671     GSI_COORD_t         posIn;           /* inertial position and orientation of reference point                   [m,m,m,rad,rad,rad] */
00672     GSI_COORD_t         speedIn;         /* inertial speed and rates                                   [m/s,m/s,m/s,rad/s,rad/s,rad/s] */
00673     GSI_POINT_t         accelIn;         /* inertial acceleration                                                     [m/s2,m/s2,m/s2] */
00674     GSI_VEHICLE_SYS_t   systems;         /* info about vehicle system states (steering, lights etc.)                               [-] */
00675 } GSI_DYNAMICS_OUTPUT_t;
00676

00678 typedef struct
00679 {

00682     float        roadDist;        /* distance to signal along road                              [m] */
00683     GSI_COORD_t  posIn;           /* inertial position of signal                [m,m,m,rad,rad,rad] */
00684     int32_t      type;            /* signal type according to OpenDRIVE                         [-] */
00685     int32_t      subType;         /* signal sub-type according to OpenDRIVE                     [-] */
00686     float        value;           /* value associated with signal                               [-] */
00687     uint32_t     state;           /* traffic sign's state (if dynamic)                          [-] */
00688     uint32_t     spare;           /* spare for upcoming info                                    [-] */
00689 } GSI_TRAFFIC_SIGN_t;
00690

00733 } GSI_SCORING_t;

00790 
00791 
00792 /* ------ header ------ */
00793 typedef struct
00794 {
00795     uint16_t magicNo;      /* must be 14711                                                                                [-] */
00796     uint16_t version;      /* upper byte = major, lower byte = minor                                                       [-] */
00797     uint32_t frameNo;      /* number of the simulation frame                                                               [-] */
00798     double   simTime;      /* simulation time                                                                              [s] */
00799     uint16_t pkgId;        /* package identifier                                                                           [-] */
00800     uint16_t dataVersion;  /* version number of data block                                                                 [-] */
00801     uint32_t dataSize;     /* size of data following the header                                                         [byte] */
00802     uint32_t elementSize;  /* Ver. 0x0004: if data following the header contains an array of elements:                  [byte] */
00803                            /*              size of one element in this data                                                    */
00804                            /*              (elementSize is equivalent to dataSize if only one element is transmitted)          */
00805     uint32_t headerSize;   /* Ver. 0x0004: size of this header structure when transmitted                               [byte] */
00806     uint32_t noElements;   /* Ver. 0x000C: number of elements following the header data which may also                         */
00807                                   /*              be computed from dataSize and elementSize                                    [byte] */
00808 } GSI_MSG_HDR_t;
00809 
00810 /* ------ the message union ------ */
00811 typedef union
00812 {
00813     GSI_VEHICLE_STATE_t       egoState;                      /* macroscopic EGO state information                               */
00814     GSI_VEHICLE_DYN_t         egoDynamics;                   /* EGO dynamics information                                        */
00815     GSI_VEHICLE_STATE_t       vehicle;                       /* traffic player (vehicle) information                            */
00816     GSI_TRAF_OBJECT_STATE_t   pedestrian;                    /* traffic player (pedestrian)  information, has no acceleration   */
00817     GSI_IMAGE_t               image;                         /* video image (followed by data)                                  */
00818     GSI_OBJECT_LIST_t         objList;                       /* list of detected objects (e.g. from sensor)                     */
00819     GSI_CAMERA_INFO_t         camera;                        /* camera settings used for video image                            */
00820     GSI_ROADMARK_INFO_t       roadMarkInfo;                  /* road mark information for a player (EGO)                        */
00821     GSI_LIGHT_SOURCE_INFO_t   lightSrcInfo;                  /* info about a light source                                       */
00822     GSI_CONTACT_POINT_INFO_t  contactPoint;                  /* info about contact points                                       */
00823     GSI_DYNAMICS_INPUT_t      dynamicsInput;                 /* info about input into external dynamics                         */
00824     GSI_DYNAMICS_OUTPUT_t     dynamicsOutput;                /* info about output from external dynamics                        */
00825     GSI_TRAFFIC_SIGN_t        trafficSign;                   /* info about traffic signs seen by a vehicle                      */
00826     GSI_ENVIRONMENT_t         environment;                   /* info about environment state                                    */
00827     GSI_TRAF_OBJECT_CFG_t     trafObjCfg;                    /* info about traffic object configuration                         */
00828     GSI_PED_ANIMATION_t       pedAnimation;                  /* pedestrian animation (joint angles etc.)                        */
00829     GSI_SCORING_t             scoring;                       /* scoring information                                             */
00830     GSI_TRIGGER_t             trigger;                       /* trigger information                                             */
00831     GSI_DRIVER_CTRL_t         driverCtrl;                    /* driver input (e.g. from mockup)                                 */
00832     GSI_TRLIGHT_INFO_t        trLightInfo;                   /* info about traffic lights                                       */
00833     GSI_VEHICLE_DYN_SIMPLE_t  vehicleDynamicsSimple;         /* simplified information about a vehicle's dynamics state         */
00834     GSI_ROAD_STATE_t          roadState;                     /* simplified road state for certain vehicles                      */
00835     GSI_LIGHT_SOURCE_CMPLX_t  lightSrcComplex;               /* info about a complex light source                               */
00836     GSI_TRLIGHT_SIMPLE_t      trLightSimple;                 /* simplified traffic light information                            */
00837     GSI_TRAF_INFO_DRVR_CTRL_t trafDriverCtrl;                /* traffic driver contol info                                      */
00838     
00839     /* --------------- prototype elements for GSI rev. 2 ------------------ */
00840     GSI2_VEHICLE_STATE_t     gsi2VehicleState;              /* traffic player (vehicle) information                            */
00841 } GSI_MSG_UNION_t;
00842 
00843 /* ------ now the complete message ------ */
00844 typedef struct
00845 {
00846     GSI_MSG_HDR_t   hdr;
00847     GSI_MSG_UNION_t u;
00848 } GSI_MSG_t;
00849 
00850 #endif      /* _VTD_GENERIC_SIMULATION_ICD_H */
00851 
00852 // end of pragma 4
00853 #pragma pack(pop)
00854
